subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Mirror, mirror on the wall.......
author: Laura OBryant

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable



I got initiated into the paranormal 4 yrs ago and accidentally got my fir=
st EVP 3 yrs ago. I went crazy searching for information about spirit boxes=
. And what I found is that most people sing the praises of Frank's Ghost bo=
x and Frank Sumption. I didn't know who Frank Sumption was (still don't kno=
w you personally) but from what I could tell there were (are) many many peo=
ple who believe that Frank Sumption is a giant when it comes to spirit boxe=
s.=C2=A0

You can't control what people say or do. But your work seems to s=
tand on it's own merit. So it doesn't matter what your competitors say, it =
still stands that Frank Sumption is the giant among spirit boxes and is up =
there with Thomas Edison. You are letting them upset you when the reality i=
s, you are still on top. So let them say what they want. And let them make =
improvements and have their own merit. From my point of view, as an outside=
r looking in, they are standing on your shoulders. I have no vestment in th=
is argument or in you and your rivals. Don't let them drive you insane with=
 their claims or weigh you down with unnecessary anger and bitterness. You =
are doing just fine.=C2=A0

Question now is, are you going to believe those=
 who anger you and tell you you are not the original creator OR are you goi=
ng to believe someone that is a total stranger that did her research a few =
years ago before stumbling onto this argument? And may I remind you I have =
no vestment in this argument whatsoever? You could say I'm biased since whe=
n I researched I came to believe myself that Frank Sumption was/is a giant =
when it comes to spirit boxes. If I were you, I'd choose to believe me and =
go on to create bad ass equipment and not reveal your secrets. :)
Laura

__=
______________________________
From: purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@gma=
il.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 9, 2011 1:37 =
PM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Mirror, mirror on the wall.......


=C2=A0 
Acade=
mic! I am not going to spend the last few months of this Earth cycle arguin=
g with jerk fucks that wanna rip off all things paranormal cuz they can not=
 make a name for themselves in any other field. "The paranormal" requires n=
o proof, no credentials, all one has to do is make some grandiose claims an=
d followers fall out of the trees. 

"My guys" repeat over and over and ove=
r, everytime I turn on a box the last couple months "June 15th--wormwood--e=
nd of Earth"(paraphrasing), yeah, I know, everyone some how knows better, j=
ust like they know nothing to the Mayan, and all the other end of days pred=
ictions from around the world-- every freaking culture, and all time period=
s up the present, for the same frikkin' date/year.

Hmmm, Wormwood!? A bitt=
er herb/drug--a cure for Eartha? Ahhhh, no comet/asteroid named Wormwood, i=
t's an effect of an asteroid/comet/natural disaster. A drug, a cure, a clea=
nsing. 

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Laura OBryant <lauraobryant@.=
..> wrote:
>
> 
> 
> I have been reading the arguments for a few weeks now =
and can I say what I think? Just as Newton and Einstein and others like the=
m are giants, they have people such as Stephen Hawking that stand on their =
shoulders. The Hawkings that stand on the shoulders of giants are no less g=
enius in their own right and should also be given credit also. But we can't=
 forget that the giants themselves made mistakes and had failures along the=
 way. They are no less than genius for their trial and errors as well as th=
eir successes. For had we not had the giants, failures and all, we would no=
t advance any further in technology and wisdom. :)
> 
> Another thought is =
many times ideas come around the same time in different locations. This is =
a phenomenon that has fascinated me and I often wonder how 2 or more people=
 can get the same thought in roughly the same time period. Take for instanc=
e the discovery of small particles in atoms (or molecules, I am rusty at my=
 science sorry). There were scientists discovering these in different locat=
ions around the world at the same time! I'm sure it can be argued that one =
scientist discovered the break through before another but it doesn't disput=
e the fact that both were working on the same thing in the same time period=
.=C3=82=C2=A0
> 
> So for argument sake let's give credit to those who have=
 successfully engineered the spirit boxes and those who have stood on the s=
houlders of the original inventors and keep in mind there may be a few of t=
he original inventors at the same time! You discovered it. GREAT! How wonde=
rful that you contributed to something so genius! I hope that you continue =
to experiment and enrich us with your findings and failings as those are im=
portant too. (Remember that Edison failed many times with the light bulb be=
fore he got it right.) I would encourage all of you to go forward and advan=
ce your technologies and remember there is always someone trying to steal f=
ame and fortune. You can protect your ideas with patents before releasing t=
hem to the public if you are really concerned with ownership of originality=
.=C3=82=C2=A0
> 
> I hope I haven't overstepped my bounds but I want to rea=
ssure those who are frustrated that there are those who recognize genius an=
d those who stand on shoulders from those who steal. Just because we are si=
lent doesn't mean we are blind, deaf, and mute. I hope this helps.=C3=82=C2=
=A0
> 
> Laura
>

> >=C3=82=C2=A0Time for me to back the fuck up and look in the mirror. Sin=
ce day one, one arguement after another over the boxes, what they are for, =
who can use it, how one jerkoff or another is the master box user and deter=
mines who can use the box,=C3=82=C2=A0and always somebody claims my work no=
 good, while theirs superior.=C3=82=C2=A0 I'm jumping off this track, ya wa=
nt it? You got it, someone else can have the loonies, the con men, the tric=
ksters, the posers, and the "ones that know better". Not getting sucked int=
o the dark with this box crap any longer,=C3=82=C2=A0it was supposed to be =
for my own use anyway, y'all simply can't handle that level of spirit commu=
nication. Learned the hard way that there is a reason why certain knowledge=
 is withheld from the uninitiated. =C3=82=C2=A0I can't fix what I have done=
, all I can do is walk away. Like the guy said "you can't handle=C3=82=C2=
=A0the truth!" 
> >=C3=82=C2=A0
> >=C3=82=C2=A0Not gonna debate it, been th=
ere done that, no one hears or listens, always " Oh, I know so much better"=
 is the response. "For my research", yeah, heard that about five hundred ti=
mes! 
> >=C3=82=C2=A0
> >=C3=82=C2=A0Time for me to seek the light side of =
the force--while there is still time. 
> >=C3=82=C2=A0
> >=C3=82=C2=A0Frank=
 Sumption
